alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Bradford, southeastern Baker, Union, southern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sanderson to Palestine Community to near Columbia to 6 miles southwest of Mcalpin. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Butler, Raiford, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, Fort White, Palestine Community, Groves, Providence, Beasley and New River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union
